column2: Traffic;Prey Veng (DAP): A car fell off a ferry at Prasat Lech village
column3: Pea Reang district  on the morning of September 5
column4: 2018.------Authorities and citizens stripped down and chipped in to winch the Lexus on to dry land. Nobody was injured.------ ------លិច​ទូក​ចម្លង​ បណ្តាល​ឲ្យ​លិច​រថយន្ត​មួយ​គ្រឿង​ សមត្ថកិច្ច​ជួយ​សង្គ្រោះ​ទាន់​
